title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that teaches how to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones through small daily improvements.

title: You Don't Know JS Yet
author: Kyle Simpson
description: A deep dive into JavaScript fundamentals, exploring scopes, closures, and async behavior.
